dt: {bc}a feeling of great surprise and wonder {bc}the state of being {d_link|astonished|astonished} {bc}{sx|amazement||}

dt.t: The garden's beauty filled me with {wi}astonishment{/wi}.

dt: {bc}something that astonishes {bc}a cause of amazement or wonder

dt.t: Everything that he had seen so far … had been so astonishing that he began to wonder whether there could possibly be any more {wi}astonishments{/wi} left.

shortdef: a feeling of great surprise and wonder : the state of being astonished : amazement
something that astonishes : a cause of amazement or wonder
